data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Piura, Peru.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Piura, Peru

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,395,853 lost in Piura that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Piura, Peru today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Piura, Peru with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Nonuya people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, make the 234,948 believers in Piura to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,395,853 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 234,948 believers in Piura, Peru a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Piura, Peru has a population of 1,630,800.

We estimate Piura has 234,948 people who might know Jesus, 1,298,993 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 96,860 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Piura.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
